heading: University
content: Starting my Engineering degree at the University of Cambridge

heading: Renishaw Work Experience
content: 1 Week Engineering work experience where as a team we had to desgin and manufacture a metrological instrument to measure length and hole diameters to a resolution of 0.5mm.

heading: Sixth Form
content: Studied for A Levels at the New Sixth, Bath. Achieved 4A* in Physics, Chemistr, Maths, Further Maths (self-taught)
